Table 1 9_5_06.xls Supplementary Table 1 Gompertz parameters ♂ ♀ Strain Intercept Slope Intercept Slope K33 w-5.78 0.077-6.04 0.075 hsNF1/+; K33 w-8.67 0.074-8.68 0.073 Arm-GAL4/+-5.03 0.072-4.45 0.077 UAS-dNF1 on 2nd/+-3.59 0.064-3.81 0.069 UAS-dNF1 on 3rd/+-4.42 0.067-4.14 0.073 Arm-GAL4/UAS-dNF1 2nd-7.01 0.061-6.64 0.061 Arm-GAL4/UAS-dNF1 3rd-6.42 0.057-6.06 0.053 Gompertz mortality parameters were estimated by ln(x) = ln(0) + ax The intercept ln(0) is used as an estimate of baseline or age-independent mortality and the slope a as the rate of mortality or age-dependent mortality.
